Title: Scrambled Eggs and Toast - Breakf: 1) Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk them until well blended.
2) Heat a generous pat of butter or margarine in a non-stick skillet over medium heat.
3) Pour the egg mixture into the skillet and stir until eggs are light and fluffy.

place the bread slices in a toaster. Toaster on until lightly toasted.

Title: Scrambled Eggs and Toast - Breakf: 5) Serve the scrambled eggs with the toast. Enjoy!
